description: The flight control system shall compute pitch control commands based on aircraft state inputs.
The flight control system shall acquire pitch-related sensor data for control computation.
The pitch control laws shall execute at a rate sufficient to maintain pitch stability.
The flight control system shall generate elevator actuator commands to control aircraft pitch.
The flight control system shall meet end-to-end pitch control response time requirements.
The flight control system shall detect failures in pitch-related sensors.
The flight control system shall maintain pitch control using remaining valid sensors after a sensor failure.
The flight control system shall validate pitch sensor data before use in control computation.
The flight control system shall detect abnormal pitch control behavior.
The flight control system shall provide alerts to the pilot when pitch control anomalies are detected.
